body_html: Just want to comment on this, Subset looks more like an iterator to get a subset of data defined by indices. It is probably more appropriate to put Samplers under torch.utils.data.sampler
body_text: Just want to comment on this, Subset looks more like an iterator to get a subset of data defined by indices. It is probably more appropriate to put Samplers under torch.utils.data.sampler
body: Just want to comment on this, [Subset](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/ba062e7da986bae28fea41f45bc85a1f8a74573d/torch/utils/data/dataset.py#L90-L106) looks more like an iterator to get a subset of data defined by `indices`. It is probably more appropriate to put Samplers under `torch.utils.data.sampler`
